name: Epitome Of Mysteries
description:
There is a mystery that needs the help of Inspector Grévil! ... But he is sick in bed, so Victorique takes his place instead. What will she find and unfold this time, on her own?

This is a fangame for the Gosick series. Without any spoilers, the timeline of this case is meant to be an in-between to the events of the anime series.

A visual novel mystery game with small puzzle elements and character movement in an enclosed area. There are no sounds in the game, as everything is made with ASCII text, no controller support either. Do enjoy with your own music at your own pace!

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Option: Number Keys
  • Confirm (Selection / Action): Enter
  • Exit Game: Alt + F4 / Close Window
